scripts.test:php:legacy:all: export WP_VERSION=3.8 && npm run test:php:legacy && export WP_VERSION=latest && npm run test:php:legacy
scripts.test:php:functional: npm run test:php --BWP_Recaptcha:phpunit_suite='functional' && npm run test:php --BWP_Recaptcha:phpunit_suite='functional-multisite'
scripts.test:php:functional:all: npm run test:php:functional:stable && npm run test:php:functional:3.8 && npm run test:php:functional:beta
scripts.test:php:stable: npm run test:php:unit && npm run test:php:functional:stable
scripts.test:php:all: npm run test:php:unit && npm run test:php:functional:all
scripts.build:ci: export WP_DB_USER=root && export WP_DB_PASS=wordpress && npm run test:php:all
scripts.build:legacy: export WP_DB_USER=root && export WP_DB_PASS=wordpress && npm run test:php:legacy:all
scripts.init: composer install && cd vendor/kminh/bwp-framework && npm run init
